text: @tedcruz @mschlapp Get your wife,kids, aunts uncles cousins grandparents out there volunteering in hospitals with COVID-19 patients, grocery stores where people are asymptomatic with COVID-19. Show your constituents how your family are on the front lines to save trumps campaign
